title: Show 83 - EMILY THORNBERRY (Live)
itunes:title: Show 83 - EMILY THORNBERRY (Live)

description:
Emily Thornberry - Live Emily Thornberry is one of the biggest stars in British politics. She joins Matt for a raucous evening with risque tales of campaigning as well as emotional stories about her upbringing. Emily and Matt also discuss the merits of her voice. Oh and there's Brexit. Because of course there is. Get tickets to Matt's live 'Brexit Through the Gift Shop' shows on 1 and 5 December here: https://www.southbankcentre.co.uk/whats-on/133159-brexit-through-gift-shop-matt-forde-2018 The guests for Matt's Political Party Christmas Specials are: 19 December: Jess Phillips and Sarah Wollaston 20 December: Alastair Campbell and Nick Boles You can get tickets here: https://leicestersquaretheatre.ticketsolve.com/shows/873589775 Follow Emily on Twitter: @EmilyThornberry Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde Email the show: politicalpartypodcast@gmail.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
